text: [Ba jod ovar] On goh ki Alloh taolo [iddai] ononro dar xoʙat ʙa tu andak nison dod va agar esonro ʙisjor nison medod, musallaman, sust [-u ʙaddil] mesuded va dar kori [cang] ixtilof mekarded. Vale Alloh taolo [sumoro az susti va ixtilof] dar amon nigoh dost. Be gumon, U ʙa onci dar sinahost, ogoh ast
